feature.label: JCRCMDS Core
feature.description: The "JCRCMDS Core Feature" is a bridge to the JCRCMDS IBM i library of Craig Rutledge. The JCRCMDS library is not part of the feature and must be downloaded from Craig's homepage and installed deparately. The home of the JCRCMDS library is at http://www.jcrcmds.com/.
feature.copyright: Copyright (c) 2016-2017 JCRCMDS Project Team. All rights reserved.

discovery.label: Craig Rutledge - Open Source iSeries Tools
